Package uk.ac.leeds.ccg.agdt.generic.lang

Class Generic_String

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.leeds.ccg.agdt.generic.lang.Generic_String
public class Generic_String
extends java.lang.Object
Some useful methods for transforming Strings.
Version:
1.0.1
Author:
Andy Turner

  • Method Details

    • addNumerals

      public static void addNumerals​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> s)
      Adds the numbers 0 to 9 inclusive to s.
      Parameters:
      s - The set to add the numerals to.

    • getNoWhitespace

      public static java.lang.String getNoWhitespace​(java.lang.String s)
      Parameters:
      s - A String a copy of which is returned with all white-space removed.
      Returns:
      A copy of s which is returned with all white-space removed.

    • getNoWhitespaceUpperCase

      public static java.lang.String getNoWhitespaceUpperCase​(java.lang.String s)
      Parameters:
      s - A String a copy of which an upper case version is returned with all white-space removed.
      Returns:
      A copy of s which is returned in upper case and with all white-space removed.

    • getCapitalFirstLetter

      public static java.lang.String getCapitalFirstLetter​(java.lang.String s)
      For copying a String and capitalising the first letter.
      Parameters:
      s - An instance of a String that will be copied and returned with the first letter capitalised.
      Returns:
      s but with the first letter capitalised.

    • getCount

      public static int getCount​(java.lang.String s, java.lang.String s0)
      Returns a count of the number of times s0 appears in s. If s is "sss" and s0 is "ss" then count is 1. If s is "ssss" and s0 is "ss" then count is 2.
      Parameters:
      s - The string for which instances of s0 are counted.
      s0 - The string for which the number of occurrences in s is returned.
      Returns:
      a count of the number of times s0 appears in s.
